message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product,  $9000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $8500. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $8500 is a good price for you, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9500 is still outside my budget.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $8500.  It's a fair price considering the product's value to me, and it's a good deal for you as well. Let's find common ground and make this happen.

I understand that $8500 is a good price for you, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $9200. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a good value for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but $9200 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm going to stick with my offer of $8500. This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's a good deal considering the product's value to me. If you're not willing to come down to this price, I may have to look elsewhere for this product.

I understand that you're sticking to your offer of $8500, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $8900. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a good value for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

Alice, I appreciate your continued negotiation and willingness to compromise. $8900 is getting closer, but I'm still hoping to find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8700.  This is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and it's a good deal for you as well.  Let's close this deal and make this happen!

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $8800. This is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a good value for the product. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
